title: CSS Animated Grid Layouts
description: In CSS Grid, the grid-template-columns and grid-template-rows properties allow you to define line names and track sizing of grid columns and rows, respectively. Supporting interpolation for these properties allows grid layouts to smoothly transition between states, instead of snapping at the halfway point of an animation or transition.
